text: vahee hai jisane tumhen mittee se paida, phir veery se, phir rakt ke lothade se; phir vah tumhen ek bachche ke roop mein nikaalata hai, phir (tumhen badhaata hai) taaki apanee praudhata ko praapti ho, phir muhalat deta hai ki tum budhaape ko pahuncho - yadyapi tumamen se koee isase pahale bhee utha liya jaata hai - aur yah isalie karata hai ki tum ek niyat avadhi tak pahunch jao aur aisa isalie hai ki tum samajho
